text:
....
"ini tuh pake rumus phytagoras kan?" tanya eunwo yang kepalanya udah keluar asep. jaehyun yang ditanya cuma garuk-garuk kepalanya yang ga gatel.
"ini kita belajar bareng. ngapain malah minta ajarin gua? lu nanya gua, terus gua nanya siapa??.... oh! joni. bentar ya!" eunwo ngangguk. mungkin a Johnny bisa bantu, mungkin. batin eunwo dan jungkook.
"wo, kook kata dia bentar dulu. mau ganti baju" lapor jaehyun lalu duduk lagi disebelah eunwo. jungkook cuma ngangguk dan lanjut nugas.
"eh jey, emangnya a Johnny jago mtk ya?" tanya eunwo. jaehyun senyum. "engga. cuma kalo ga ada Johnny sepi aja rasanya," jawab jaehyun polos. emh.. dasar.
"sudah teridentifikasi bucin pangkat lima." timpal jungkook tanpa lepas dari tugasnya.
trans:
....
“Is this using the Pythagorean theorem?” Eunwo asked, his head filled with smoke from thinking too hard. Jaehyun, the one being asked, just scratched his head, which wasn’t even itchy.
“We’re supposed to be learning together. Why are you asking me? If you’re asking me, then who do I ask? Oh! Joni. Hold on!” Eunwo nodded, hoping that Johnny might be able to help, perhaps. Both Eunwo and Jungkook shared the same thought.
“Wo, Kook said to wait a moment. He wants to change clothes,” Jaehyun reported as he sat back down next to Eunwo. Jungkook just nodded and continued working on his assignment.
“Hey Jey, is Johnny good at math?” Eunwo asked. Jaehyun smiled. “No. But it just feels lonely without Johnny around,” he answered innocently. Emh.. typical.
“Level five simp identified,” Jungkook chimed in without looking up from his work.
